translation: O Arjuna, bound by your own Karma (action) born of your own nature, that which from delusion you wish not to do, even that you shall do helplessly.
commentary: 18.60 Svabhavajena born of (thy) own nature? Kaunteya O son of Kunti? Dealt with bound? Sven (thy) own? Karmana by action? to do to do? Not not? wish (thou) wishest? that which? Mohat from delusion? will you (thou) shalt do? Of course helpless? Even also? That that.Commentary Thou art endowed? Or Arjuna? with martial alities? prowess? courage? skill? etc. Thou art? therefore? bound by these innate alities. Thou wilt be forced to fight by thy own nature. Will nature constrain thee to fight? much against your will.
